SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, OnAchievedCommonGoalListener, OnAchievedPersonalGoalListener, OnAdjacentTilesUpdatedListener, OnAssignedCommonGoalListener, OnAssignedPersonalGoalListener, OnBoardRefilledListener, OnBoardUpdatedListener, OnBookShelfUpdatedListener, OnChangedCommonGoalAvailableScoreListener, OnCurrentPlayerChangedListener, OnExceptionsListener, OnLastPlayerUpdatedListener, OnMessageSentListener, OnPlayersListChangedListener, OnPlayerStateChangedListener, OnPointsUpdatedListener, OnStateChangedListener, OnWinnerChangedListener, OnClientConnectionLostListener, LogicInterface
public class Client extends Object implements ClientInterface, LogicInterface, OnClientConnectionLostListener
The Client class represents a client in the game. It implements the ClientInterface and LogicInterface interfaces, which define the methods for interacting with the server and handling game logic.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
